languages.text: "Я настаиваю на совместном расследовании. Арест члена свиты Вольного Торговца без объяснений противоречит закону и моим регалиям, дарованным Патентом".
"I insist on a joint investigation. Arresting a Rogue Trader's retinue member without any justification stands in breach of the law and my privileges under the Warrant of Trade."
languages.original_text: "Я настаиваю на совместном расследовании. Арест члена свиты Вольного Торговца без объяснений противоречит закону и моим регалиям, дарованным Патентом".

traits.locale_text: "I insist on a joint investigation. An unexplained arrest of a Rogue Trader's retinue member stands in breach of the law and my Warrant-granted entitlements."
"I insist on a joint investigation. An unexplained arrest of a Rogue Trader's retinue member stands in breach of the law and my Warrant-granted entitlements."
"I insist on a joint investigation. An unexplained arrest of a Rogue Trader's retinue member stands in breach of the law and my Warrant-granted entitlements."
"I insist on a joint investigation. An unexplained arrest of a Rogue Trader's retinue member stands in breach of the law and my Warrant-granted entitlements."
"I insist on a joint investigation. Arresting a Rogue Trader's retinue member without any justification stands in breach of the law and my privileges under the Warrant of Trade."
"I insist on a joint investigation. Arresting a Rogue Trader's retinue member without any justification stands in breach of the law and my privileges under the Warrant of Trade."

languages.text: 「共同捜査を強く要求する。自由開拓者の従者の一員を正当な理由もなく逮捕することは、法律および通商許可証で認められた{mf|俺|私}の権利に対する違反である」
languages.original_text: "I insist on a joint investigation. Arresting a Rogue Trader's retinue member without any justification stands in breach of the law and my privileges under the Warrant of Trade."

traits.locale_text: 「共同捜査を強く要求する。自由開拓者の従者の一員を正当な理由もなく逮捕することは、法律および通商許可証で認められた{mf|俺|私}の権利に対する違反である」

languages.text: “我坚持要求进行联合调查。你们打算无故逮捕行商浪人的随行人员，这既违背了帝国法律，也违背了授状赐予我的权力。”
languages.original_text: "I insist on a joint investigation. Arresting a Rogue Trader's retinue member without any justification stands in breach of the law and my privileges under the Warrant of Trade."

traits.locale_text: “我坚持要求进行联合调查。你们打算无故逮捕行商浪人的随行人员，这既违背了帝国法律，也违背了许可证赐予我的权力。”

languages.text: "Ich bestehe auf einer gemeinsamen Untersuchung. Die unbegründete Festsetzung eines Mitgliedes der Entourage {mf|eines Freihändlers|einer Freihändlerin} verstößt gegen das Gesetz und meine gemäß Handelsbrief gewährten Privilegien."
languages.original_text: "I insist on a joint investigation. Arresting a Rogue Trader's retinue member without any justification stands in breach of the law and my privileges under the Warrant of Trade."

traits.locale_text: "Ich bestehe auf einer gemeinsamen Untersuchung. Eine unerklärte Festnahme eines Mitglieds aus dem Gefolge {mf|des Freihändlers|der Freihändlerin} wäre gegen das Gesetz und meine Rechte durch den Handelsbrief."

languages.text: « J'insiste pour mener une enquête conjointe. L'arrestation injustifiée d'un membre de l'entourage {mf|du libre-marchand|de la libre-marchande} contrevient à la loi et aux privilèges conférés par ma lettre de marque. »
languages.original_text: "I insist on a joint investigation. Arresting a Rogue Trader's retinue member without any justification stands in breach of the law and my privileges under the Warrant of Trade."

traits.locale_text: « J'insiste pour mener une enquête conjointe. L'arrestation injustifiée d'un membre de l'entourage {mf|du libre-marchand|de la libre-marchande} contrevient à la loi et aux privilèges conférés par ma lettre de marque. »

languages.text: «Insisto en llevar a cabo una investigación conjunta. Arrestar sin justificación a un miembro del séquito de {mf|un|una} Comerciante Independiente vulnera la ley y los privilegios que me otorga mi Patente de Comercio».
languages.original_text: "I insist on a joint investigation. Arresting a Rogue Trader's retinue member without any justification stands in breach of the law and my privileges under the Warrant of Trade."

traits.locale_text: «Insisto en una investigación conjunta. Arrestar sin justificación a un miembro del séquito de {mf|un|una} Comerciante Independiente vulnera la ley y los privilegios que me otorga mi Patente».

languages.text: "Ortak inceleme gerçekleştirmemiz konusunda ısrar ediyorum. Haklı bir gerekçe olmadan Hür Tacir'in maiyetinden birini tutuklamak, kanunlara ve Ticari Ruhsatname'nin bana sağladığı ayrıcalıklara aykırıdır."
languages.original_text: "I insist on a joint investigation. Arresting a Rogue Trader's retinue member without any justification stands in breach of the law and my privileges under the Warrant of Trade."

traits.locale_text: "Ortak inceleme gerçekleştirmemiz konusunda ısrar ediyorum. Haklı bir gerekçe olmadan Hür Tacir'in maiyetinden birini tutuklamak kanunlara ve Ticari Ruhsatname'nin bana sağladığı ayrıcalıklara aykırıdır."
